original: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽aom mu tsi ni sv'a h'a /
analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo // aom mu tsi ni sv'a h'a /
translated: Homage to the great Yakṣa general Vajrapāṇi.🔽Oṃ mucinis svāhā.

original: chu khyor ba gang la bzlas pa byas te 'thungs nas sems bzhin du nyal na /
analyzed: chu khyor ba gang la bzlas pa byas te 'thungs nas sems bzhin du nyal na /
translated: Recite over a handful of water, drink it, and go to sleep as you wish.

original: lag na rdo rjes rmi lam ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lag na rdo rjes rmi lam ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: Vajrapāṇi will show you your dreams.

original: rmi lam mthong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so //
analyzed: rmi lam mthong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so //
translated: The Dhāraṇī called “Seeing Dreams” is complete.
